snippet.title: BitCraft - Official Announcement Trailer 4K
snippet.description:
BitCraft is a community sandbox massively multiplayer online (MMO) game set in a fantasy world which encourages many different play styles ranging from farming, hunting, and crafting to city-building and social strategy, rather than emphasizing combat alone. As players shape the world for their own purposes they will begin to uncover an ancient past.

Pre-Alpha starts soon! Sign up now at https://www.bitcraftonline.com.
Join the community: https://discord.gg/Hc2579AGPC
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BitCraftOnline

Music and sound design by Benedict Nichols (www.benedictnichols.com)
